name: Back Home (RaymondEdmund)
description:
Your star ship INS Domum (Latin, home) has been attacked by creatures of extraterrestrial origin; destroying various modules of the ship and stalling her mid-flight and leaving you stranded in the middle of nowhere (quite literally). Repair all the damaged modules of our ship, so that you can go Back Home. Beware of the various dangers lurking in your ship, and don't forget to keep an eye on your life support. Most important of all; do not die. 

Have fun!
